name: Ducky Duck 2: Riding in the Factory
name_original: Ducky Duck 2: Riding in the Factory
description:
Ducky Duck is a found-footage horror game where you need to escape a duck. What? Exactly a duck, a giant duck. In this game, you'll need to get out from a factory.

Controls (Take a moment to read them):

W: Forward.
S: Backward.

A: Steer left.
D: Steer right.

Space: Brake.

E or Left Mouse Button: Interact.

F: Flashlight.

Tips:

In the pause menu, you have some handy tips.
